scripts.initial-setup: pnpm install-and-audit && pnpm -r build && pnpm -r bundle
scripts.install-and-audit: ADBLOCK=true OPENCOLLECTIVE_HIDE=true pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm audit --registry=https://registry.npmjs.com/ --audit-level high
scripts.cdk-deploy: cd infra && pnpm cdk deploy "Projects-Portal/*" --require-approval never --concurrency 4
